column5: Well a buddy was visiting from Pickering and another buddy was up camping for the weekend, so what better incentive to go fishing??  Took them out to a small lake nearby for some fun fishing.  Being a tournament angler, most of my fishing is either tournaments or pre-fishing, where I'm trying to get them to bite but not hook them.  I really lose sight of the "fun fishing."  And let me tell you, I had a blast on Saturday with my two buddies.  Being a tournament angler, we still had to each weigh our 5 biggest, a little friendly competition, but no pressure, which was nice, a missed fish was frustrating, but not a costly error, takes a lot off your shoulders let me tell you.  Oh yeah, and an 8:30 launch time is acceptable... woohoo.  So we launch at 8:30 and first fish is in the boat at 8:40, Slow presentations were key ... tubes, senkos, flippin jigs and lizards all put fish in the boat for us, even a few crankbait fish.  All in all we caught over 30 fish, mostly in 4-6 feet of water, although the bigger fish came in about 8.  Andrew only had 3 fish, but they went 7lbs 1oz.    Tyler had 5 fish for 11 lbs 2 oz.    I had 5 fish for 12 lbs 1 oz.    No huge fish, but we had a blast....  Oh yeah, and out biggest 5 TOTAL, went 12 lbs 8 oz.    Thanks for reading.  SR
Another great report Steve, looks like you guys had a blast!
Some nice sized bass there Steve.  Beauty colours on them.  I like it when they're nice and green like that.  Great day that's for sure  Joey
Some really decent bass there. Nice work!
Good Job, some nice ones there.  Cheers Marc
nice bunch of fish, way to go
another fine bass report keep em coming
Nice catch guys !!!!!!!!!  ! great fishing   cheers
